build.setting:
{"key":"reg_rules","default":"

Please take a moment to review these rules.<\/p>

Please remember that we are not responsible for any messages posted. We do not vouch for or warrant the accuracy, completeness or usefulness of any message, and are not responsible for the contents of any message.<\/p>

The messages express the views of the author of the message, not necessarily the views of this website. Any user who feels that a posted message is objectionable is encouraged to contact us immediately by email. We have the ability to remove objectionable messages and we will make every effort to do so, within a reasonable time frame, if we determine that removal is necessary.<\/p>

You agree, through your use of this service, that you will not use this website to post any material which is knowingly false and\/or defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, sexually oriented, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, or otherwise violative of any law.<\/p>

You agree not to post any copyrighted material unless the copyright is owned by you or by this website.<\/p>

Our software uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a personalized experience when you browse this site.<\/p>","report":"bool"}
